name: Duluth Trading Company
description: Duluth Trading Company is a leading retailer of workwear and casual clothing, known for its high-quality, durable products designed for hardworking individuals. Founded in 1989 in Duluth, Minnesota, the company initially catered to tradesmen with its innovative and functional apparel. Over the years, Duluth Trading has expanded its offerings to include a wide range of clothing for men and women, as well as accessories and gear that emphasize comfort, functionality, and ruggedness. The brand is particularly recognized for its unique products such as the Longtail T-Shirt, which is designed to provide extra coverage, and its signature work pants that feature utility pockets and reinforced stitching. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, Duluth Trading has built a loyal customer base and operates both physical retail stores across the United States and a robust online shopping platform. The company emphasizes its Midwestern roots and values, aiming to provide practical solutions for everyday challenges faced by its customers, whether in their work or leisure activities. Duluth Trading Company continues to innovate in the apparel industry, focusing on creating functional, comfortable, and timeless clothing that meets the needs of its diverse clientele.

seo.meta_title: Duluth Trading Company | Workwear & Casual Clothing
seo.meta_description: Explore Duluth Trading Company, your go-to source for durable workwear and casual clothing designed for hardworking individuals. Discover our innovative products today!

faq.question: What does Duluth Trading Company specialize in?
faq.answer: Duluth Trading Company specializes in workwear and casual clothing designed for durability and functionality.

faq.question: Where is Duluth Trading Company headquartered?
faq.answer: Duluth Trading Company is headquartered in Belleville, Wisconsin, USA.

faq.question: What are some popular products from Duluth Trading?
faq.answer: Popular products include Longtail T-Shirts, work pants, and outerwear.

faq.question: When was Duluth Trading Company founded?
faq.answer: Duluth Trading Company was founded in 1989.
